Text:
Two days after their meeting, the pair depart the
capital and successfully enter Oriana Kingdom.
They infiltrate the masquerade ballâ€•

So, everyone really is wearing masks. It's sort of
in poor taste...

It's the sort of place where aristocrats come to
enjoy a little thrill with each other. I can see why
you'd find it in poor taste.

I guess bored aristocrats need these kinds of
diversions.

...Seems you don't like these kinds of gatherings
either.

I used to be sent to events like this often.
Maybe I'm just tired of them.
I see, so you've had your fill of them.

By the way, why are swords allowed at a ball?
Normally, they're not allowed at parties.

I suppose it's because this isn't an ordinary party.
I'm still not exactly sure what's going on.
That doesn't sit right with me...

(Well, it's probably a ploy to wipe out the remnants
of the Perv faction... It's actually quite obvious.)

Anyway, we should focus on gathering information
about your brother... That being said, it seems
something has already started.
What's started?

It's dance time. We should dance with some random
men to avoid suspicionâ€•
Absolutely not.
...If we don't, it will make us stand out.

I don't care! Dancing with any man other than Cid is
out of the question!

Oh dear, well, that's a problem... That leaves us
with no choice.

In that case, let's dance together. Come on, give me
your hand.
What?! W-Wait a minute...!
Follow my lead... That's right, you're doing well.
...I can do this much, of course.

Are you still upset with me? I was trying to be
considerate in my own way.

Well, it's better than dancing with some strange
man, but...
I just don't like how you anticipate my thoughts.

Thank you for your honesty. You know, I'm actually
starting to enjoy this.

Oh? Maybe you should also try being honest.
You don't seem to be having fun at all.

Is that how it looks to you? I thought I was
enjoying myself behind this mask.
Not that I care. I can't see you anyway.
Guess not. ...Anyway, that's one song done.
*sigh* It's finally over. Seriously, what a hassleâ€•

...Is that woman staring at us? Were we dancing that
strangely?
I don't think so, but...it's a little concerning.

Maybe she knows something about Cid...?!
I'll go gather some information!
...And she's gone.
Excuse me. You were looking at us just nowâ€•
Eeeeek!
Huh? Wh-What's the matter?!

Y-You're the Owl...aren't you? Don't kill me...
please!

Oh, come on... I'm not going to do anything!
I just want to talk...!

Anyway, come over here! You don't want to attract
attention either, do you?!
...Looks like you've calmed down.

Y-Yes... I panicked because your mask matched the
description of the Owl.

The Owl... You mentioned that name earlier.
What does it mean?

...You really don't know? The Owl is a masked spy
getting a lot of buzz lately.

There was a rumor the Owl might infiltrate the ball
today. I was so frightened...
I see... So the Owl is that frightening.
O-Of course! After all, the Owl's true identity...
...is rumored to be...that Shadow!
...What?

(Even I know that name. Shadow is the one causing a
stir everywhere... No, that's not the issue!)

(Let's say the Owl is Shadow, and the mask was
originally his...)
(Why was it in Cid's room...?)

...No, that's impossible. Cid must've gotten
involved in all this by accident. He can be
a bit absent-minded...
There's just no way...
You're his...
His what? Who're you talking about?!
Shadow...
Cid, do you know...about Shadow?

He was impressive at the Bushin Festival, wasn't he?
What about him?

(No... It's impossible! Completely, utterly
impossible!)
(But if it's true... If Cid is Shadow...)
(...Then everything makes sense...)
A-Are you okay...? You look pale...
...Yes, I'm fine. Sorry for bothering you. Goodbye.

(I have to find out more about the mask from that
woman...)
...By the way, where did she go...?
